attributes.action: use the Royal Navy to tow Britain (and Ireland if they ask nicely) too warmer waters
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I propose that we, the Great nation of Britain, build a giant underwater laser to separate our Islands land mass from the seabed, and then use the ships of the Royal Navy to tow our country to warmer waters. First choice destinations would be either the Caribbean, Mediterranean or the Indian Ocean, but we would settle for somewhere near Australia if needs be.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
